\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 69990}

\subsection*{Cured My Insomnia}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Insomniac}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 0.25 mg & oral & Pharms - Triazolam & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 210.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I started taking this drug for major insomnia.  My doctor prescribed it to me and I was a little apprehensive at first because of it's history of being a drug with strange side effects.  I've taken all of the drugs for insomnia including, Ambien 5mg and 10mg, Xanax up to 2mg @ bedtime, all of the OTC's, and this drug by far is the most effective.  Additionally it's one of the cheapest prescription sleep aids I've tried and I love it.  I highly recommend this drug to anyone with insomnia.

\end{document}
